name: K8s Resource Specification
description: This Resource Specification is used to describe a K8s

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: Name
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The alias of the K8s as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: Description
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The description of the K8s as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: hostIP
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address where the K8s can be accessed at

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: clientCertificate
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The Client Certificate needed to access the K8s

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: clientKey
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The Client Key needed to access the K8s

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: clusterCaCertificate
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The Cluster Ca Certificate needed to access the K8s

resourceSpecCHaracteristic.name: accessToken
resourceSpecCHaracteristic.description: The Access Token needed to access the K8s
